name: Meteor Racing
description:
INTRODUCTION

Hello Everyone!

We are CyberLab Studios, at our seventh Ludum Dare togheter! 

Today we present you Meteor Racing: a racing game with a little twist according to this jam theme "every 10 seconds"

GAMEPLAY

Meteor Racing is a simple racing game, drive your car as fast as you can for 3 laps in our CyberLab Raceway, but be careful! every 10 seconds meteors will fall from the sky and you will have to avoid them!

CONTROLS

Gamepad  is recommended for optimal gaming experience

Gamepad

Left Analog stick to steer

Right Trigger to accelerate

Left Trigger to decelerate/reverse

Keyboard

W S for accelerate and decelerate/reverse

AD for left and right

CREDITS

Andrea Di Bartolo 3d Art - 2d Art - Game Design - Announcer Voice

Samuele Padalino  Code - Ui - Game Design

 Music and Sound effects are from [www.zapsplat.com](www.zapsplat.com) 

 Main menu track: CaperCube - Dynamite & Daywater
